name.ja: <ruby>地<rt>じ</rt></ruby><ruby>縛<rt>ばく</rt></ruby><ruby>戒<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>隷<rt>れい</rt></ruby> ジオグラシャ＝ラボラス

text.en:
1 "Earthbound" Fusion Monster + 1 "Earthbound" Synchro Monster
Must be Fusion Summoned.  At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a monster: Change that monster's ATK/DEF to 0. If an opponent's monster(s) is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Earthbound Servant Geo Grasha" once per turn. If this face-up card in its owner's control leaves the field because of an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Earthbound" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck.
